{"compiler":{"version":"0.8.30+commit.73712a01"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[],"name":"Insufficient","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"InvalidRakeback","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"OnlyAuthorized","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"OnlyBonds","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"Zero","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"ZeroAddress","type":"error"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"bytes32","name":"code","type":"bytes32"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"address","name":"sender","type":"address"}],"name":"Affiliate","type":"event"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"player","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"addPresaleCoinCredit","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint24","name":"lvl","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"address","name":"player","type":"address"}],"name":"affiliateBonusInfo","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint96","name":"topScore","type":"uint96"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"playerScore","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint24","name":"currLevel","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"address","name":"player","type":"address"}],"name":"affiliateBonusPointsBest","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"points","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"affiliateCode","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"owner","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"rakeback","type":"uint8"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint24","name":"","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"affiliateCoinEarned","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint24","name":"lvl","type":"uint24"}],"name":"affiliateTop","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"player","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint96","name":"score","type":"uint96"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"player","type":"address"}],"name":"consumePresaleCoin","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"code_","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"rakebackPct","type":"uint8"}],"name":"createAffiliateCode","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"player","type":"address"}],"name":"getReferrer","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"code","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"address","name":"sender","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint24","name":"lvl","type":"uint24"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"gameState","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"bool","name":"rngLocked","type":"bool"}],"name":"payAffiliate","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"playerRakeback","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"presaleActive","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"presaleClaimableTotal","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"presaleCoinEarned","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"code_","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"referPlayer","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"player","type":"address"}],"name":"referralCodeOf","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"code","type":"bytes32"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"referralJoinLevel","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint24","name":"","type":"uint24"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"shutdownPresale","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"stateMutability":"payable","type":"receive"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Central hub for all affiliate-related operations in the Degenerus ecosystem. INTEGRATION POINTS: - DegenerusBonds: Calls payAffiliate() for bond purchases, addPresaleCoinCredit() for rewards - DegenerusCoin: Calls consumePresaleCoin() for presale claims - DegenerusGamepieces: Calls payAffiliate() for map purchases - DegenerusAdmin: Can call addPresaleCoinCredit() for LINK donation rewards","events":{"Affiliate(uint256,bytes32,address)":{"params":{"amount":"Context-dependent: 1 = code created, 0 = player referred, >1 = reward amount.","code":"The affiliate code involved (indexed for efficient log filtering).","sender":"The player or affiliate address involved."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addPresaleCoinCredit(address,uint256)":{"details":"Deprecated: credits are paid immediately as flip stakes. ACCESS: coin, ContractAddresses.BONDS, or ContractAddresses.ADMIN.","params":{"amount":"The amount to credit (18 decimals).","player":"The player to credit."}},"affiliateBonusInfo(uint24,address)":{"details":"Returns both the top score and the queried player's score.      Used by frontends to show relative position.","params":{"lvl":"The game level to query.","player":"The player to get score for."},"returns":{"playerScore":"The queried player's score (whole tokens).","topScore":"The highest score for this level."}},"affiliateBonusPointsBest(uint24,address)":{"details":"Checks both the previous level and two levels back, returns the better result.      This allows players to benefit from good performance in recent levels. BONUS CALCULATION: - Points = (playerScore * AFFILIATE_BONUS_SCALE) / topScore - Capped at AFFILIATE_BONUS_MAX (25 points) - Top 20% of leaderboard earns maximum bonus","params":{"currLevel":"The current game level.","player":"The player to calculate bonus for."},"returns":{"points":"Bonus points (0 to AFFILIATE_BONUS_MAX)."}},"affiliateTop(uint24)":{"details":"Returns the affiliate with the highest earnings for that level.      Used for bonus point calculations in mint trait rolls.","params":{"lvl":"The game level to query."},"returns":{"player":"Address of the top affiliate.","score":"Their score in whole tokens (6-decimal amount / 1 ether)."}},"consumePresaleCoin(address)":{"details":"Deprecated: presale rewards are paid immediately. ACCESS: coin only.","params":{"player":"The player claiming their presale rewards."},"returns":{"amount":"The amount to mint for the player (legacy only)."}},"createAffiliateCode(bytes32,uint8)":{"details":"Anyone can create an affiliate code. Codes are permanent and cannot be      transferred or deleted. The rakeback percentage determines how much of      the affiliate reward is returned to referred players as an incentive. VALIDATION: - code_ != bytes32(0) (reserved for \"no code\") - code_ != REF_CODE_LOCKED (reserved sentinel value) - code_ not already taken - rakebackPct <= 25 (max 25% rakeback)","params":{"code_":"The affiliate code to claim (typically a short string cast to bytes32).","rakebackPct":"Percentage of rewards returned to referred players (0-25)."}},"getReferrer(address)":{"details":"Returns address(0) if player has no valid referrer.","params":{"player":"The player to look up."},"returns":{"_0":"The referrer's address, or address(0) if none."}},"payAffiliate(uint256,bytes32,address,uint24,uint8,bool)":{"details":"Core payout logic. Handles referral resolution, reward scaling,      multi-tier distribution, and presale vs post-presale logic. ACCESS: coin, ContractAddresses.BONDS, or gamepieces only. REWARD FLOW: +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | 1. Resolve referral code (stored or provided)                      | | 2. Apply reward decay based on levels since join                   | | 3. Calculate rakeback (returned to player)                         | | 4. Pay direct affiliate (base - rakeback)                          | | 5. Pay upline1 (20% of scaled amount)                              | | 6. Pay upline2 (20% of upline1 share = 4%)                         | | 7. Quest rewards added on top (post-presale only)                  | +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ PRESALE vs POST-PRESALE: - Presale: Rewards immediately distributed via creditFlip() (ContractAddresses.BONDS only) - Post-presale: Rewards immediately distributed via creditFlip()","params":{"amount":"Base reward amount (18 decimals).","code":"Affiliate code provided with the transaction (may be bytes32(0)).","gameState":"Current game FSM state (unused; retained for interface compatibility).","lvl":"Current game level (for join tracking and leaderboard).","rngLocked":"Whether VRF is pending (unused; retained for interface compatibility).","sender":"The player making the purchase."},"returns":{"playerRakeback":"Amount of rakeback credited to the player."}},"presaleActive()":{"details":"Returns true until shutdownPresale() is called by ContractAddresses.BONDS.      During presale, affiliate rewards are paid immediately (ContractAddresses.BONDS only).","returns":{"_0":"True if presale is active, false if shutdown."}},"referPlayer(bytes32)":{"details":"This is the explicit user-initiated way to set a referrer.      Alternatively, referrers can be set implicitly during payAffiliate().      Once set (or locked), cannot be changed. VALIDATION: - code_ must exist (owner != address(0)) - code_ owner must not be the caller (no self-referral) - caller must not already have a referral code set","params":{"code_":"The affiliate code to register under."}},"referralCodeOf(address)":{"details":"Wrapper around _referralCode for external access.","params":{"player":"The player to look up."},"returns":{"code":"The valid referral code, or bytes32(0)."}},"shutdownPresale()":{"details":"Can only be called by ContractAddresses.BONDS contract. One-way state transition.      After shutdown:      - payAffiliate() continues direct creditFlip() distribution      - consumePresaleCoin() is deprecated ACCESS: ContractAddresses.BONDS only."}},"stateVariables":{"AFFILIATE_BONUS_MAX":{"details":"Applied to mint trait rolls; top 20% of leaderboard earns this max."},"AFFILIATE_BONUS_SCALE":{"details":"Formula: (playerScore * SCALE) / topScore, capped at MAX.      125 = 25 * 5, meaning you need 20% of top score to hit max."},"REF_CODE_LOCKED":{"details":"Set when a player makes an invalid referral attempt (self-referral, unknown code)      after the game has started. Prevents gaming by trying multiple codes."},"affiliateCode":{"details":"codes are permanent once created; owner cannot be changed.      Reserved value: bytes32(0) = invalid, bytes32(1) = REF_CODE_LOCKED sentinel."},"affiliateCoinEarned":{"details":"Used for leaderboard calculations and bonus point determination.      Amounts include 18 decimal places; divide by 1 ether for whole tokens."},"affiliateTopByLevel":{"details":"Private storage; use affiliateTop() view to read.      Updated in _updateTopAffiliate() when affiliate exceeds current top."},"playerReferralCode":{"details":"Private to prevent external manipulation; use referralCodeOf() view.      bytes32(0) = not yet set, REF_CODE_LOCKED = permanently locked."},"presaleClaimableTotal":{"details":"Deprecated: preserved for storage compatibility."},"presaleCoinEarned":{"details":"Deprecated: presale rewards are now paid immediately."},"presaleShutdown":{"details":"Set permanently via shutdownPresale(). Once true:      - payAffiliate() continues direct creditFlip() distribution      - consumePresaleCoin() is deprecated      - Cannot be unset (one-way state transition)"},"referralJoinLevel":{"details":"Used by _referralRewardScaleBps() to calculate reward decay.      Level 0 = presale/early join; decay starts after 50 levels."}},"title":"DegenerusAffiliate","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"Insufficient()":[{"notice":"Generic insufficient condition error (code taken, invalid referral, ETH forward fail)."}],"InvalidRakeback()":[{"notice":"Thrown when rakeback percentage exceeds the maximum allowed (25%)."}],"OnlyAuthorized()":[{"notice":"Thrown when caller is not in the authorized set (coin, ContractAddresses.BONDS, ContractAddresses.ADMIN, gamepieces)."}],"OnlyBonds()":[{"notice":"Thrown when a function restricted to ContractAddresses.BONDS is called by another address."}],"Zero()":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to create an affiliate code with zero or reserved value."}],"ZeroAddress()":[{"notice":"Thrown when a required address parameter is zero."}]},"events":{"Affiliate(uint256,bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Emitted on affiliate code creation, referral registration, and reward payouts."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"addPresaleCoinCredit(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Credit presale coin from external sources (e.g., LINK donation rewards)."},"affiliateBonusInfo(uint24,address)":{"notice":"Get leaderboard info for bonus calculations."},"affiliateBonusPointsBest(uint24,address)":{"notice":"Calculate the best affiliate bonus points for a player."},"affiliateCode(bytes32)":{"notice":"Mapping from affiliate code (bytes32) to ownership info."},"affiliateCoinEarned(uint24,address)":{"notice":"Per-level earnings tracking: level \u2192 affiliate \u2192 raw token amount."},"affiliateTop(uint24)":{"notice":"Get the top affiliate for a given game level."},"consumePresaleCoin(address)":{"notice":"Consume and return a player's accrued presale coin for minting."},"createAffiliateCode(bytes32,uint8)":{"notice":"Create a new affiliate code owned by the caller."},"getReferrer(address)":{"notice":"Get the referrer address for a player."},"payAffiliate(uint256,bytes32,address,uint24,uint8,bool)":{"notice":"Process affiliate rewards for a purchase or gameplay action."},"presaleActive()":{"notice":"Check if presale period is still active."},"presaleClaimableTotal()":{"notice":"Total unclaimed presale coin across all players."},"presaleCoinEarned(address)":{"notice":"Presale-era affiliate earnings awaiting claim."},"referPlayer(bytes32)":{"notice":"Register the caller as referred by an affiliate code."},"referralCodeOf(address)":{"notice":"External view to get a player's referral code."},"referralJoinLevel(address)":{"notice":"Records the game level when a player's referral was established."},"shutdownPresale()":{"notice":"Permanently close the presale period."}},"notice":"Multi-tier affiliate referral system with presale support and leaderboard tracking.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/DegenerusAffiliate.sol":"DegenerusAffiliate"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"details":{"constantOptimizer":true,"cse":true,"deduplicate":true,"inliner":true,"jumpdestRemover":true,"orderLiterals":true,"peephole":true,"simpleCounterForLoopUncheckedIncrement":true,"yul":true,"yulDetails":{"optimizerSteps":"dhfoDgvulfnTUtnIf:fDnTOcmuO","stackAllocation":true}},"runs":200},"remappings":[":@arbitrum/=node_modules/@arbitrum/",":@chainlink/=node_modules/@chainlink/",":@eth-optimism/=node_modules/@chainlink/contracts/node_modules/@eth-optimism/",":@offchainlabs/=node_modules/@offchainlabs/",":@openzeppelin/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/",":@scroll-tech/=node_modules/@scroll-tech/",":@zksync/=node_modules/@zksync/",":erc721a/=node_modules/erc721a/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/",":solady/=node_modules/solady/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/ContractAddresses.sol":{"keccak256":"0x773c919574c05ba618701fedbdae4175a3605a5847981e752037c2278a0c06ed","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d53147d50f52792abe4b0a369cfd5a0f17e0ad73d2ef9be739520b6771870f79","dweb:/ipfs/QmYRCpkAjDpvN23n3jyzt2QtwgdDmVB7WT7X1ch6BCH2UV"]},"contracts/DegenerusAffiliate.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd601a73d76f914e07fb7bbb855ecd5ab797daeed126f7ff56c8a98c48666c49f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9b9c9a49b66eabbfe56920028e71d952fec24bb83e5b6069146000f0b7c23eb0","dweb:/ipfs/QmNMW99XwoM3ZrEAkyYVd5vT9GHdrnUishKd8499W5qvcJ"]},"contracts/interfaces/IDegenerusGame.sol":{"keccak256":"0x33f8ea9d37555cae770ea20f7aebd410e82d081a186a8d9c6c0b8381f7bd2bec","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2d8c9a757219252f2aa9387e643c4e4e24c913ceffb54cc97e0ee89bcd31cf43","dweb:/ipfs/QmUZ2jsGxb818X9DZBvXzT9SXbw8ASk3QwYXtPfkwNCB9M"]}},"version":1}

addPresaleCoinCredit(address,uint256).details: Deprecated: credits are paid immediately as flip stakes. ACCESS: coin, ContractAddresses.BONDS, or ContractAddresses.ADMIN.

affiliateBonusInfo(uint24,address).details: Returns both the top score and the queried player's score.      Used by frontends to show relative position.

params.player: The player to get score for.

returns.topScore: The highest score for this level.

affiliateBonusPointsBest(uint24,address).details: Checks both the previous level and two levels back, returns the better result.      This allows players to benefit from good performance in recent levels. BONUS CALCULATION: - Points = (playerScore * AFFILIATE_BONUS_SCALE) / topScore - Capped at AFFILIATE_BONUS_MAX (25 points) - Top 20% of leaderboard earns maximum bonus

params.player: The player to calculate bonus for.

affiliateTop(uint24).details: Returns the affiliate with the highest earnings for that level.      Used for bonus point calculations in mint trait rolls.

returns.score: Their score in whole tokens (6-decimal amount / 1 ether).

consumePresaleCoin(address).details: Deprecated: presale rewards are paid immediately. ACCESS: coin only.

params.player: The player claiming their presale rewards.

returns.amount: The amount to mint for the player (legacy only).

createAffiliateCode(bytes32,uint8).details: Anyone can create an affiliate code. Codes are permanent and cannot be      transferred or deleted. The rakeback percentage determines how much of      the affiliate reward is returned to referred players as an incentive. VALIDATION: - code_ != bytes32(0) (reserved for "no code") - code_ != REF_CODE_LOCKED (reserved sentinel value) - code_ not already taken - rakebackPct <= 25 (max 25% rakeback)

params.code_: The affiliate code to claim (typically a short string cast to bytes32).
params.rakebackPct: Percentage of rewards returned to referred players (0-25).

getReferrer(address).details: Returns address(0) if player has no valid referrer.

returns._0: The referrer's address, or address(0) if none.

payAffiliate(uint256,bytes32,address,uin.details: Core payout logic. Handles referral resolution, reward scaling,      multi-tier distribution, and presale vs post-presale logic. ACCESS: coin, ContractAddresses.BONDS, or gamepieces only. REWARD FLOW: +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | 1. Resolve referral code (stored or provided)                      | | 2. Apply reward decay based on levels since join                   | | 3. Calculate rakeback (returned to player)                         | | 4. Pay direct affiliate (base - rakeback)                          | | 5. Pay upline1 (20% of scaled amount)                              | | 6. Pay upline2 (20% of upline1 share = 4%)                         | | 7. Quest rewards added on top (post-presale only)                  | +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ PRESALE vs POST-PRESALE: - Presale: Rewards immediately distributed via creditFlip() (ContractAddresses.BONDS only) - Post-presale: Rewards immediately distributed via creditFlip()

params.code: Affiliate code provided with the transaction (may be bytes32(0)).
params.gameState: Current game FSM state (unused; retained for interface compatibility).
params.lvl: Current game level (for join tracking and leaderboard).
params.rngLocked: Whether VRF is pending (unused; retained for interface compatibility).

returns.playerRakeback: Amount of rakeback credited to the player.

presaleActive().details: Returns true until shutdownPresale() is called by ContractAddresses.BONDS.      During presale, affiliate rewards are paid immediately (ContractAddresses.BONDS only).

returns._0: True if presale is active, false if shutdown.

referPlayer(bytes32).details: This is the explicit user-initiated way to set a referrer.      Alternatively, referrers can be set implicitly during payAffiliate().      Once set (or locked), cannot be changed. VALIDATION: - code_ must exist (owner != address(0)) - code_ owner must not be the caller (no self-referral) - caller must not already have a referral code set

params.code_: The affiliate code to register under.

returns.code: The valid referral code, or bytes32(0).

shutdownPresale().details: Can only be called by ContractAddresses.BONDS contract. One-way state transition.      After shutdown:      - payAffiliate() continues direct creditFlip() distribution      - consumePresaleCoin() is deprecated ACCESS: ContractAddresses.BONDS only.

addPresaleCoinCredit(address,uint256).notice: Credit presale coin from external sources (e.g., LINK donation rewards).

affiliateBonusInfo(uint24,address).notice: Get leaderboard info for bonus calculations.

affiliateBonusPointsBest(uint24,address).notice: Calculate the best affiliate bonus points for a player.

affiliateCode(bytes32).notice: Mapping from affiliate code (bytes32) to ownership info.

affiliateCoinEarned(uint24,address).notice: Per-level earnings tracking: level  affiliate  raw token amount.

affiliateTop(uint24).notice: Get the top affiliate for a given game level.

consumePresaleCoin(address).notice: Consume and return a player's accrued presale coin for minting.

createAffiliateCode(bytes32,uint8).notice: Create a new affiliate code owned by the caller.

getReferrer(address).notice: Get the referrer address for a player.

payAffiliate(uint256,bytes32,address,uin.notice: Process affiliate rewards for a purchase or gameplay action.

presaleActive().notice: Check if presale period is still active.

presaleClaimableTotal().notice: Total unclaimed presale coin across all players.

referPlayer(bytes32).notice: Register the caller as referred by an affiliate code.

referralCodeOf(address).notice: External view to get a player's referral code.

referralJoinLevel(address).notice: Records the game level when a player's referral was established.
